title: More on Apple's Trust-Eroding 'F1 the Movie' Wallet Ad
author: dotcoma
aiHeadline: Apple continues to erode trust with yet another ad that makes you question everything they do, this time using a movie ad to sell their wallet service.

title: I made my VM think it has a CPU fan
author: todsacerdoti
aiHeadline: A developer finds a way to make their virtual machine think it has a CPU fan, because who doesn't want their imaginary computer to have imaginary cooling issues?

title: Show HN: Octelium â€“ FOSS Alternative to Teleport, Cloudflare, Tailscale, Ngrok
author: geoctl
aiHeadline: Another open-source project claims to be the better alternative to all the other tools you already use, because the world needs more options for solving the same problem.

title: Using the Internet without IPv4 connectivity
author: jmillikin
aiHeadline: A developer shares their journey of using the internet without IPv4, proving that sometimes the simplest things are the hardest to achieve.

title: Loss of key US satellite data could send hurricane forecasting back 'decades'
author: trauco
aiHeadline: The US loses key satellite data, potentially setting hurricane forecasting back decades, because nothing says 'we're prepared' like relying on outdated technology.
